entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
